summary: Provides a Deployment model that aggregates all configuration needed to run a Prefect flow—including identification, versioning, description, tags, schedule, infrastructure, storage, entrypoint, parameters, and schema enforcement—and includes utilities for loading deployment definitions from YAML and resolving the corresponding flow objects.
business_intent: Allow users to define, persist, and manage Prefect flow deployments with comprehensive settings for scheduling, execution resources, and runtime environment, facilitating automated deployment loading and execution.
